amendment.description: An amendment numbered 12 printed in House Report 118-4 to apply the bill's requirements to all major Executive Orders which cause an annual gross budgetary effect of at least $1 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Perry.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
